idea:
Faa Industries Pvt. Ltd., a boutique furniture studio committed to our legacy of delivering premium quality solid wood furniture. We craft contemporary designs through wood artisans using traditional craftsmanship techniques. Our products are targeted fro “High-end Residential” and the “Hospitality Sector”. We believe in the transition for keeping in times with the fast-paced and volume based nature of today’s wood crafting industry and are confident of being able to give shape to any specific design/requirement that you have.

Faa showroom and factory is located at Naigaon, Mumbai and our products are conceptualised and manufactured right here in the suburb of Mumbai from our spacious 15,000 Sq.Ft. wood working facility. We have invested in talented designers, hand-picked craftsmen and the best in class machinery that shape our artistic designs. Our business is family owned and we have been blessed with an inheritance in wood working art and skill, that has been passed down over generations. Our skilled workforce is adept in using modern technology to flawlessly build with the magic touch of handmade craft.
name: FAA Industries Private Limited

idea: As entire maintenance industry is working on reactive and followup based approach. Where there is a large amount of spend on following up with different people to attend various breakdown.  We have created our service product which shall use our proprietary logic  to identify breakdowns much before which use IOT to get realtime data from all the equipments under our AMC. There will be a energy monitoring of each devices and any equipment consuming more energy will be solved on priority. Also all equipment will be maintained under one roof.
name: PAULSHANTANU ENGINEERING PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We have started a small Takeaway food joint in Mumbai. We are currently having small QSR. Quick service restauarant. We have planning to launch such models in various locations of city.
name: MARVOSA MULTIBIZ PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
What we do at Swachh Sustainable Solutions ?
At Swachh Sustainable Solutions(SSS) we provide holistic waste management solution to households, organizations & institution. We aim to be a one stop solution for urban waste management needs. Under SSS we have the following vertical:
· RaddiConnect – Recyclable scrap collection service to households, organizations & institutions. Proceeds generated from the recyclable scrap are used to support one of our affiliated NGOs. We have an aggregated network of 150 RaddiWallas(Small scale scrap vendors) that we work with to manage our collections.
· Decentralized Wet Waste Solution – Providing on site composting solutions to residential complexes, hotels, hospitals, institution, etc to manage their organic waste. We are currently providing manual composting tumblers, semi-automatic & fully-automatic composting machines.
· Material Recovery Facility – With support of the local municipality we have setup our first centralized centre to manage dry waste at a ward level. Dry waste is collected from all waste generators in the cluster, which is then emptied at our centre where with the help of local rag pickers we sort the scrap into different categories and then its sold to relevant recyclers.
· Extended Producer Responsibility – In light of the new Plastic Waste Management Rules 2016 we are working with bulk waste plastic generators to help them reduce their plastic footprint, for the same we design customized recovery plans to recover their plastic waste, while ensuring the plastic waste we collect is being disposed of responsibly. With the help of our Material Recovery Facility, network of 150+ scrap vendors and a customer base which includes households, schools and corporate offices we setup a recovery channel for the plastic waste and ensure the same is being sent to MPCB authorized recyclers.
name: SWACHH SUSTAINABLE SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Payso is a low cost digital payment acquiring solution via both bank and non-bank mobile payment applications to offline retail merchants for over the counter payment collections.
